devdoc.author: Aave, influenced by https://github.com/wbobeirne/eth-balance-checker/blob/master/contracts/BalanceChecker.sol
devdoc.details: NOTE: THIS CONTRACT IS NOT USED WITHIN THE AAVE PROTOCOL. It's an accessory contract used to reduce the number of calls towards the blockchain from the Aave backend.*

balanceOf(address,address).details: Check the token balance of a wallet in a token contract Returns the balance of the token for user. Avoids possible errors: - return 0 on non-contract address*

getUserWalletBalances(address).details: provides balances of user wallet for all reserves available on the pool

devdoc.title: WalletBalanceProvider contract

userdoc.notice: Implements a logic of getting multiple tokens balance for one user address
